item.title: 中国买的是保险，不是火箭筒
item.description:
北京并不希望刺激家庭消费信心，而是希望限制经济放缓。【原文：

Beijing is looking less to energize household consumption confidence and more to limit an economic slowdown.

】

item.title: 中国扣留苹果 "iPhone 之城 "的四名台湾员工
item.description: 中国警方拘留了苹果公司的主要组装合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司的四名台湾员工，这是一连串拘留事件中最新的一起，动摇了投资者对中国的信心。【原文：Chinese police have taken into custody four Taiwanese employees at Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Apple Inc.’s main assembly partner, the latest in a spate of detentions that have rattled investor confidence in the country.】

item.title: 英国水务监管机构为推迟价格审查裁决铺平道路
item.description: 英国水务行业监督机构采取措施，可能会推迟一项重要的投资裁决，此举可能会进一步挤压泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd.）的财务状况。【原文：The UK water industry watchdog took steps to potentially delay a key investment ruling, a move that could further squeeze the finances of Thames Water Utilities Ltd.】

item.title: 欧盟的 Facebook 和 TikTok 用户在与社交网站发生纠纷时可获得裁判权
item.description: 一个新组织正试图赋予社交媒体用户更多权力。但首先...【原文：A new organization is trying to give social media users more power. But first...】

item.title: 华尔街专业人士避免大选押注，因为选情尚未明朗
item.description: 再过不到一个月，美国人将在美国历史上最具影响力的选举中投票。但在华尔街，一切都异常平静，因为所谓的 "聪明资金 "不愿为即将发生的事情下注。【原文：In less than a month, Americans will vote in one of the most consequential elections in US history. But on Wall Street things are eerily quiet, as the so-called smart money is reluctant to wager on what’s about to happen.】

item.title: 家具销售商降价后宜家销售下滑
item.description: 2024 年，宜家的销售额受到打击，因为这家平板包装家具销售商降低了价格，以保持顾客能够负担得起。【原文：Ikea’s sales took a hit in 2024 as the flat-pack furniture seller lowered prices in a bid to remain affordable for its customers.】

item.title: 卡冈亚戈认为南非通胀下滑将为政策提供空间
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，未来几个月的通胀率可能会降至 4% 以下，这为官员们在 9 月份降息后采取行动创造了更大的空间。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said inflation could fall below 4% in coming months, creating more room for action after officials cut interest rates in September.】

item.title: 上周伊朗遭袭后，石油看涨押注创多年来最大涨幅
item.description: 伊朗对以色列发动导弹袭击后，布伦特原油价格飙升，投资基金上周增加了对布伦特原油价格的看涨押注，增幅为2018年以来最大。【原文：Investment funds increased their bullish bets on Brent crude prices by the most since 2018 last week, as prices roared higher following Iran’s missile attack on Israel.】

item.title: 亚洲 IT 领军企业 TCS 业绩低于预期，显示科技支出疲软
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）的季度利润未能达到分析师的预期，这表明从银行到零售商的客户在承诺对信息技术进行大规模投资方面仍然犹豫不决。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.’s quarterly profit missed analysts’ estimates, a sign that clients from banks to retailers remain hesitant to commit to large investments on information technology.】

item.title: 警方称以色列国防公司埃尔比特是瑞典枪击案的目标
item.description: 以色列国防公司埃尔比特系统公司（Elbit Systems）的瑞典子公司周四上午遭到枪击。【原文：Israeli defense firm Elbit Systems’ Swedish subsidiary was the target of a shooting Thursday morning.】

item.title: Seven & i 将一分为二，抵御 Couche-Tard 接管
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co. 公司正在进行有史以来最大规模的改革，打赌大胆的分拆将有助于抵御一家规模较小的竞争对手主动提出的收购建议，并弥补低迷的利润前景。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. is embarking on its biggest-ever overhaul, betting that a bold breakup will help fend off an unsolicited takeover proposal from a smaller rival and make up for a sluggish profit outlook.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储降息、CPI 日以及中国股市动荡不安，这些都是对美联储降息、CPI 日以及中国股市动荡不安的反击。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Pushback against the Fed’s rate cut, CPI day and volatility grips Chinese stocks. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 穆迪称 PE 支持的公司违约率较高
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的一份报告显示，私募股权公司拥有的公司比其他投机级借款人违约的频率更高。【原文：Companies owned by private equity firms are landing in default more frequently than other speculative-grade borrowers, according to a report from Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 摩根大通称欧洲矿商对美国大选风险定价过低
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：European mining stocks could see their valuations fall by as much as 20% if US tariffs are imposed following next month’s election, and the industrial metals market is underpricing this possibility, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚在 S&P 升级后的首次会议上保持利率稳定
item.description: 在巴尔干国家首次获得投资级评级后，塞尔维亚的政策制定者在权衡挥之不去的通胀担忧和货币升值压力后，维持了利率稳定。【原文：Serbian policymakers held interest rates steady as they weighed lingering inflation concerns against upward pressure on the currency after the Balkan nation secured its first investment-grade rating.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴旗下 Lazada 希望阿玛尼、D&G 助其实现千亿美元目标
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）旗下的 Lazada 正在追求欧洲顶级时尚和设计品牌，以帮助其抵御亚洲竞争对手，最终实现到 2030 年电子商务交易额达到 1,000 亿美元的目标。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s Lazada is courting top European fashion and design brands to help fend off Asian rivals and eventually reach its goal of $100 billion in e-commerce volume by 2030.】

item.title: 花旗与万事达合作开展跨境借记卡支付业务
item.description: 万事达卡公司（Mastercard Inc）和花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）正在合作促进借记卡的全天候跨境支付，为消费者和公司在全球范围内开展业务提供另一种方式。【原文：Mastercard Inc. and Citigroup Inc. are collaborating to facilitate around-the-clock, cross-border payments with debit cards, giving consumers and companies another way to conduct business worldwide.】

item.title: 花旗银行英国分行行长要求了解国家对私人资本计划的详细情况
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s top banker in the UK wants to see clarity from the government on its plans to unlock private capital for national investment.】

item.title: 印度债券供不应求，"购买印度债券 "的呼声日益高涨
item.description: 印度 1.3 万亿美元的债券市场正面临着一个奇特的问题：由于政府回购债务并削减借款，导致供应短缺，投资者对主权债券欲罢不能。【原文：India’s $1.3 trillion bond market is facing a peculiar issue: investors can’t get enough of sovereign bonds as the government buys back debt and cuts borrowings, resulting in a supply shortage.】

item.title: 特斯拉 "梦想中的高级轿车 "在 Robotaxi 发布会上面临关键时刻
item.description: 投资者翘首以盼的特斯拉公司完全自动驾驶汽车将于本周四晚些时候首次亮相，这对特斯拉公司来说事关重大。【原文：The stakes for Tesla Inc. are high as investors eagerly await the first look at the company’s fully self-driving vehicle later on Thursday.】

item.title: 绘制地图后赞比亚将拥有部分采矿许可证
item.description: 赞比亚政府打算保留一些采矿许可证的所有权，因为正在进行的摸底调查显示这些许可证很有前景，并邀请私人投资者与国家一起开发这些资产。【原文：Zambia’s government intends to keep ownership of some mining licenses that are shown to be promising by an ongoing mapping exercise and invite private investors to develop the assets alongside the state.】

item.title: 马来西亚交易所因生物燃料需求酝酿废食用油期货
item.description: 全球棕榈油市场的主要交易所马来西亚交易所（Bursa Malaysia Bhd.【原文：Bursa Malaysia Bhd. — the main exchange for the global palm oil market — is considering launching a futures contract for used cooking oil as its demand as a biofuel feedstock grows.】

item.title: Ethos 称瑞士企业的可持续发展报告存在重大缺陷
item.description: Ethos 基金会表示，它发现瑞士公司的可持续发展报告存在重大缺陷，并呼吁加强监管，以改善该领域的做法。【原文：The Ethos Foundation said it has identified a pattern of major shortcomings in the sustainability reports of Swiss companies, and called for stronger regulation to improve practices in the area.】

item.title: 据说印度航空公司是神秘的 85 架空中客车订单背后的承运人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，空中客车公司（Airbus SE）收到了印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）追加85架飞机的订单，该航空公司希望在全球增长最快的航空市场之一加快发展步伐。【原文：Airbus SE received an order for an additional 85 planes from Air India Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, as the carrier looks to accelerate its growth ambitions in one of the world’s fastest growing aviation markets.】

item.title: 联合利华向 Arnest 集团出售业务，退出俄罗斯市场
item.description: 联合利华集团（Unilever Plc）将其俄罗斯子公司出售给当地制造商 Arnest Group，在入侵乌克兰两年半多之后退出了俄罗斯。【原文：Unilever Plc sold its Russian subsidiary to local manufacturer Arnest Group, exiting the country more than two-and-a-half years after its invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 德国贷款机构 PBB 战略调整，削减办公楼贷款
item.description: 德国房地产贷款公司 Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG 表示，该公司计划削减办公楼贷款，并将更多地关注欧洲业务，因为该公司正试图摆脱对美国商业房地产风险敞口的信任危机。【原文：German real estate lender Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG said it plans to cut back on office loans and will also focus more on its European business, as it tries to leave behind a crisis of confidence over its exposure to US commercial real estate.】

item.title: 中国炼油企业以更窄折扣获得伊朗报价
item.description: 中国的私营炼油厂称，在中东紧张局势加剧、全球投资者人心惶惶之际，伊朗卖家正试图通过缩小折扣来提高价格。【原文：Private oil refiners in China say Iranian sellers are seeking to raise their prices by offering narrower discounts, at a time of elevated tensions in the Middle East that have global investors on edge.】

item.title: 阿布扎比的阿尔达尔公司计划在迪拜世博会附近实施耗资 4.8 亿美元的项目
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的房地产开发商正在计划一个价值 18 亿迪拉姆（约合 4.8 亿美元）的项目，该项目将包括邻近迪拜的住宅、办公楼和零售店，目的是利用中东旅游和商业中心不断增长的需求。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s largest property developer is planning a 1.8 billion dirham ($480 million) project that will include homes, offices and retail locations in neighboring Dubai as it aims to capitalize on rising demand in the Middle East’s tourism and business hub.】

item.title: 乌克兰批准增加税收以满足国防需求的法案
item.description: 乌克兰议会批准了一项法律草案，从今年起增加对个人、公司和银行的税收，以满足增加的军事和国防需求。【原文：The Ukrainian parliament approved a draft law to increase taxes on individuals, companies and banks starting from this year to cover increased military and defense needs.】

item.title: 沈南鹏的洪山公司开设伦敦办事处，着眼于欧洲交易
item.description: 洪山资本集团（HongShan Capital Group）的前身是红杉资本中国基金（Sequoia Capital China），该公司正在伦敦设立办事处，在欧洲寻找投资机会。【原文：HongShan Capital Group, the firm formerly known as Sequoia Capital China, is setting up a London office to look for investment opportunities in Europe.】
